text: Blessed is He abundant is the good of God Who if He will will give you better than that treasure or orchard which they mentioned — gardens underneath which rivers flow in this world for He has already willed to give him such things in the Hereafter and will give read apocopated form wa-yaj‘al you palaces as well a variant reading of the apocopated yaj‘al is yaj‘alu ‘He will give’ beginning a new sentence.
